ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] OT: A Warning...
ygData.msgSnippet: They also thought that was a perfectly legal method of determining if you were running programs which monitored communications to your own PC on the slim
ygData.messageBody:
They also thought that was a perfectly legal method of determining if you
were running programs which monitored communications to your own PC on the
slim possibility that they might be reading the data that they sent to you.
I would guess that their lawyer is a standard business practice lawyer with
little experience in copyright and intellectual property law and none in
constitutional law.

-----Original Message-----
From: Bill Mann [mailto:dabard@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 05, 2000 11:01 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] OT: A Warning...


Remember that this is the company that thought no one would mind nor notice
if they sniffed around in your PC during a patch.

-=B=-
The Rathe
> One last tidbit for the faithful...it has been quoted to me that there is
> a legal representative on the council that makes banning decisions.
> You'd think even a Verant lawyer would know enough about covering one's
> ass to not have made a huge mistake here.




Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
